scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Christ on the central cross and two thieves on crosses to his sides. Christ is shown with a halo and a crown of thorns, bleeding from wounds. Below the cross, a group of figures includes the Virgin Mary, dressed in blue, and other women, some in mourning. To the right of the central cross stands a soldier in ornate golden armor, holding a shield with a black eagle emblem. In the background, a city with towers and buildings is visible under a blue sky. The overall scene is set in an outdoor landscape with green hills.
